Name: Political Parties Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['political parties', 'law, govt and politics', 'politics']
Description: There are two major political parties in the United States. In this lesson, learn about the history of political parties in our country, and explore ideas and symbols of Republicans and Democrats.
Concepts: ['United States', 'California', 'Maryland', 'United States House of Representatives', 'Barack Obama', 'Chicago', 'Democratic Party', 'Kentucky']
